alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 3:00AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 75 to 85 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest wind gusts from the crests along the desert slopes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. &&

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
